Update on EOS-UK Charity Fund - January 2017

by: The Honourary Treasurer - January 30, 2017
  • March 2021 Update Posted: April 02, 2021
  • Life under the Covid-19 pandemic lockdown Posted: August 12, 2020
  • September 2019 Update Posted: October 24, 2019
  • March 2019 Update Posted: March 28, 2019
  • Avocado Trees Growing Project - August 2018 Update Posted: August 31, 2018

Aproval for Gift Aid: EOS-UK Charity Fund has been granted Gift-Aid approval by HMRC. The Charity is now working towards registering with the Charity Commission as a Charitable Incorporated Organisation (CIO).

Web address and email address

EOS-UK Charity Fund’s website is now available via www.eos-uk.org as well as the previous https://eos-uk.herokuapp.com which is perhaps more cumbersome. The Charity’s email address has also been changed to eosukcharityfund@gmail.com which is easier to remember.

Futher information could be obtained by calling +44(0)7867 727445 or at eosukcharityfund@gmail.com
